text: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

translation.en: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement
translation.id: Dan mereka mendustakan (Muhammad) dan mengikuti nafsu mereka, padahal setiap urusan telah ada ketetapannya
